name: HAM Commando
description:
*work in progress / experimental *

As HAM travels towards Glowstick 7 to respond to the distress call, Ellen finds herself crashed in the harsh jungles.  After sending out the signal, she ventures into the jungle to execute her own escape. In this episode, you play as Ellen. 


CONTROLS:

* use a Gamepad  *

left stick - move
x - melee attack
y - projectile attack
a - jump / high jump

Say "yo" in the HAM Commando Discord
